column1: Weighted magnetic resonance image size (256, 128, 1) in T2, illustrating the skull of a man of 37 years old, of axial section n°73 starting from the base of the skull. The observed details include: the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 1.3184 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1386.9141 mm³, the fourth ventricle of volume 9.2285 mm³, the brainstem of volume 237.3047 mm³ and the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1426.4648 mm³.
